name: Helmet
description: A protective headgear worn by athletes in contact sports such as football, hockey, and lacrosse.

name: Pads
description: Protective equipment worn by athletes in contact sports such as football, hockey, and lacrosse to prevent injury.

name: Mouthguard
description: A device worn in the mouth to protect the teeth and gums during contact sports such as football and boxing.

name: Cleats
description: Specialized footwear worn by athletes in sports such as soccer, football, and baseball to improve traction on the playing surface.

name: Shin guards
description: Protective equipment worn by athletes in sports such as soccer and field hockey to protect the shins from injury.
